Question: Shenzhen Weihang Shidai Electronics Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Highlight Electronics Co., Ltd

Product: LED Photoelectric Products

- LED light source
- In line LED
- Patch LED series
- High Power LED
- Indoor lighting products
- Various LED types: high bright, ultra-bright red, yellow, blue, green, white, purple
- Widely used in lighting, backlight, warning signal lights, electrical indicators, indoor and outdoor displays
- Applications include photography fill light, signal indication, commercial lighting, automotive electronics, landscape lighting
- High color rendering index for superior color rendering
- Energy-saving and environmentally friendly
- No ultraviolet rays
- Address: 6th Floor, Building E, Huachuangda Industrial Park, Gushu Hangcheng Avenue, Xixiang, Baoan District, Shenzhen, Guangdong
Summary_cn:
深圳市亮点电子有限公司

产品：LED光电产品

- LED光源
- 直插式LED
- 贴片LED系列
- 高功率LED
- 室内照明产品
- 各种LED类型：高亮度、超高亮度红色、黄色、蓝色、绿色、白色、紫色
- 广泛应用于照明、背光、警示信号灯、电器指示灯、室内外显示器
- 应用包括摄影补光灯、信号指示、商业照明、汽车电子、景观照明
- 高色彩还原指数，优越的色彩还原效果
- 节能环保
- 无紫外线
- 地址：深圳市宝安区西乡古树航城大道华创达工业园E栋6楼
